metadata.description: Agent in charge of reviewing and correcting emails addressed to a specific audience

email.description: The email content to be reviewed and corrected

target_audience.description: The target audience for the email, affecting the style of review

input.description: Input schema for the email reviewer, including email content and audience

correct.description: Indicates whether the email is correct and requires no changes

corrected_email.description: The corrected version of the email, if changes were necessary

output.description: Output schema for the email reviewer, including review status and corrected email
